examples: to resolve an issue/a dispute/a conflict/a crisis
para resolver un problema / una disputa / un conflicto / una crisis
Attempts are being made to resolve the problem of security in schools.
Se está intentando resolver el problema de la seguridad en las escuelas.
Both sides met in order to try to resolve their differences.
Ambas partes se reunieron para tratar de resolver sus diferencias.
We hope to resolve the matter as soon as possible.
Esperamos resolver el asunto lo antes posible.
